title: Clients Who Make Me Sweat
content:
Stories that will make you smile, unless, of course, you are wearing a suit.

**Suits 101**

[http://blogs.graphicdesignforum.com/skirkland](http://web.archive.org/web/20071231133719/http:/blogs.graphicdesignforum.com/skirkland "http://blogs.graphicdesignforum.com/skirkland")

Also, Chris Dickman has a nice piece in the same blog area titled “Free Fonts that don’t suck.”

Thanks.
